title: - RAP BATTLE ROYALE - League of Legends [GAME]
body:
*"Every night behind the Institute of War, the Legends gather and settle their scores with a different kind of game..."*

RULES OF THE STREETS//
1: A champion must be challenged in the last three posts before they can rap.
2: A rap must end with 3 challenges.
3: 8 Verses (Lines) minimum.
4: No cursin' 

*"The sound and feeling came before the champion itself. You could feel the ground tremble beneath your feet, and the sound could only be described as the angry crescendo of a mad storm. The crowd exploded like bowling pins, champions howled as they were knocked up in the air. Eye(s) were rolled at the obvious initiation".*

THEY CALL ME MALPHITE - I AM THE UNSTOPPABLE FORCE
THIS IS BECAUSE - I HAVE NO REMORSE
I'LL STEP OVER YOUR TOES
YOU'LL BE SCREAMING "OH NO, OH NOES"
I DON'T NEED A NOSE TO GET ALL THE HOES
I'M ROCK SOLID SIMPLY PUT
WITH MY ULT I LAUNCH YOU LIKE A CATAPULT
I'M THE ONLY CONTENDER
I'LL SHRED YOU LIKE A BLENDER
MASTER JUNGLER, LANE DEFENDER, WHY DON'T YOU TRY BETT-A

I SOLO TOP, I KEEP IT LOCKED
I'LL TAKE ALL YOUR DAMAGE AS YOU STAND IN SHOCK
BECAUSE ARMOR IS MY GAME
I'LL SMASH YOUR LITTLE SPREE
PEOPLE PICK ME TO COUNTER YOUR PATHETIC AD
Hmm
Is that a rock shard in your knee?
YOUR PUNY LIFE IS MY LANE'S JOINING FEE

mm - yeah

STUCK BETWEEN A ROCK AND A HARD PLACE
YOUR LACK OF SKILL IS A TOTAL DISGRACE
I HOPE YOU'VE HAD TIME TO SAY YOUR GRACE
CUZ I'M ALREADY HERE, MESSIN' UP YOUR BASE
CAN'T YOU TELL IT FROM THE PACE
I'LL CRUSH YOU -

- not even surgeon shen will fix your face

CHALLENGES: Kha'zix, Rammus, Heimerdong ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡

replies.body:
OK it's Rammus here to rock and Roll
And this ball is rolling to it's Goal
What's that, your ADC, too bad he met Me
Cause i'll make you hit yourself with Glee
See this Thornmail, it's destined to be your Death
Since i started this rolling rampage you've had your last Breath
Life steal won't save you, this damage is un Real
So much pain this taunt, and you'll be yelling for Peel
See no one can save ya, your coming to my team
So prepare to be deleted by this master Scheme

After your death i back to base
See this is the teleport master Race
Homeguards and Mobi's combined
Your APC better have their will signed
Cause in i come at the speed of light
To seek out that explosive sight
Two down three up, Neuxs is next for us
And the explosion will make you cuss
This is Rammus i'm walking away
Cause there is no need for me to stay.

Sona, Draven, Twitch.

And yes my one is meh

Stacks baby stacks, you better move back
You'll bully me early, but later on I'll make you mad
This gangsta as cane, gon' smack you in the face
This gangsta as cane, gon' wipe out your race
I got a choice of Iceborn or Trinity Force
And before you say it noob, I'm a doge not a horse
You tryna run away, I'll wither you dead
Be scared coz I gotta skin that gives me three heads

Stack stack stack, that's the way it goes
Stack stack stack, everybody knows
Stack stack stack, better leave me be
So late game I can one shot your adc
But here's thing I got damage, but I ain't squishy
Not like Fizz or Nami, those two little fishies
Don't let the game drag on, coz thats how I get strong
My cane is here, so you better run along

Challenges: Orianna, Fizz and Irelia

Pickaboo, 
Twitch here, so you'd better be ditching lane, everybody knows I stomp every kid that mains vayne.
You  think you getn away from my main, 
you'd better leave now before you feel the wraith of my pain.
My damage is incredible my stats are a parable and at the end of the day my kda makes this game unbearable.
Maxing attack speed, attack damage and my E, the only thing I need to do next is type 'gg'.
What's that you calling me imba, please just go take a look at the old renga.
When I come out of stealth, everything around me suddenly becomes an increase in my wealth
I'm really sorry, I didn't mean to cost you LP don't hate on me I wasn't the one to go zero - fourteen (0/14)

Challenges: Teemo, Gnar, Trundle.

%%%% this actually took me like 20 minutes to think of hahah

t's time to troll, man the boss is all pumped up
Trundle in your game, troll swaggin on y'all scrubs
Actin' like bam-bam hit you with a rock club
While im stompin your pubs, wearin' loincloths bruh

Slappin team's mugs, get em all delirious
crip walk and wear rags but i'm not a gangsta
animations were designed by a bunch of prankstas
Riot thinks it's cool to give a troll a limp, son

Its unfun, when you use your hands to run
And you give me a club while you gave that chick a gun
Comin' straight out the troll cave, first time seeing sun
Unseen boss gonna turn you to the feeding one

say im feeding and i'll bite you with a crunch
call me nommykins when I make you my lunch
Club you and im out yeah that's a club punch
Hunt your team down, im on a troll hunt

Evelyn, Zed, Vayne
THIS NEEDS TO KEEP GOING. BUMP

Tick Tock, the clock it goes
This was never something i chose
Built to reminise i was
Now death is all I cause

Now to introduce the protector
The ball kills as much as hannibal lecter
Make it mad? Command: Shockwave
Getting too close is only for the Brave

Now that we are introduced, Prepare
The wombo we cause leaves nothing to spare
One champ to work with me
This is all that's required to be

Your death is quite sad
Though you were really bad
I know what makes you tick
To stop it, that is the trick

Challengers: Ahri, Azir, Ezreal

Vayne here and I have a joke for you, what's 0/3 in lane and ryhmes with blue..you.
Forget that joke lets focus on my all in poke, all I have to do is stroke you when I cloak with my q
I see you tryna run away, better pray, movement speed so fast it'll make you go insane.
OH, what's that you're building health, all you're doing is increasing my wealth....
HA-HA you think I am OP, how can you say that when you're clearly Bronze V.
"Please report this vayne for BM" please kid just go to bed it's passed 8pm.
Maxing attack speed do you really think I care, my w will proc you so hard all you can do is watch and stare.
Before I go and kill your nexus, just remember there's other losers like you in the state of Texas.

Had to go again, so good.

Challenge: Jinx, Tryn, Nasus.

FYI: I have nothing against people in Texas ;D
